title: Trial By Fire
description: Fairmentals, made of Earth, Water and Air have tried to help Emily, Karan and Adriane find Avalon. In the thrilling conclusion to the six-book-arc, the Fire Fairmental finally appears-but it is unpredictable and potentially destructive. Will it light the way to Avalon, or turn all hope to ashes?Heart-tugger one major character will make the ultimate sacrifice.
author: Rachel Roberts
